CustomField.description: Core Based Statistical Area (CBSA) name for this location, as defined by the Office of Management and Budget (OMB). A CBSA is determined by locating this address, using latitude and longitude, on a US CBSA map. If this address is not within a CBSA, the field contains "Non-CBSA Area". For CBSA's containing Metropolitan Divisions, GeoResults recognizes the Metro Division Title in place of the OMB's CBSA Title. This substitution is meant to provide more efficient analysis within exceptionally large geographies.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Core Based Statistical Area (CBSA) name for this location, as defined by the Office of Management and Budget (OMB)
CustomField.label: CBSA
